definitions: To kill by pelting with stones.
To remove the stone or pit from (a fruit).
To make (a surface) rough or smooth by rubbing with a stone.
To lap (a bore) with a stone.
examples: They decided to stone the wall for a rustic look.
She needs to stone the cherries before making the pie.
The crowd threatened to stone the accused.
He was stoned to death for his crimes.
The bore was stoned to achieve precision.
